7.ques: Which one of the following statements is true about endemic species?
options: They are found exclusively in a specific habitat
Endemic species can never become endangered
They are found only in zoos and botanical gardens
They are not affected by the destruction of their habitat
7.ans: They are found exclusively in a specific habitat

options: Genes are located in the chromosomes
Cell is located in the nucleus
Chromosomes are located in the nucleolus
8.ans: Genes are located in the chromosomes

13.ques: In order to reduce the loudness of a sound, we have to:
options: Decrease its frequency of vibration of the sound
Increase its frequency of vibration of the sound
Decrease its amplitude of vibration of the sound
Increase its amplitude of vibration of the sound
13.ans: Decrease its amplitude of vibration of the sound

15.ques: Two charged objects are brought close to each other. Choose the most appropriate statement from the following options:
options: They may attract or repel depending on the type of charges they carry
15.ans: They may attract or repel depending on the type of charges they carry

16.ques: Which of the following statements is correct regarding rods and cones in the human eye?
options: Cones are sensitive to dim light
Cones are sensitive to bright light
Rods are sensitive to bright light
16.ans: Cones are sensitive to bright light

17.ques: An astronaut standing on the surface of the moon throws a ball upwards. The ball would:
options: Directly fall down from the point it is released
Go up and then, come back to the surface of the moon
Keep going up never to come back
17.ans: Go up and then, come back to the surface of the moon
